document_data.caption: A map showing the Enlightened Ring in the central region of the Land of the Yak-Men.
document_data.name: Enlightened Ring
document_data.mainbody: The '''Enlightened Ring''' was part of the core of the [[Yikarian Empire]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}{{Cite dragon/241/Campaign Classics: The Roof of the World}}
document_data.Geography: This central province in the [[Land of the Yak-Men]] was located high in the [[World Pillar Mountains]] of northeast [[Zakhara]]. The Enlightened Ring was framed by three other yikarian provinces including [[Fiend's Wing]] to the south and east, [[Ghost Leopard]] to the north, and [[Red Goat]] to the west. Most of the province consisted of a single large plateau.
document_data.Inhabitants: The [[Elder]] governed the province, but the ultimate rule of the entire empire fell to the [[Lotus Emperor]] in the capital of [[Nathong]] atop the [[Gate of Heaven]].
document_data.Activities: Though the province was an arid region of the mountains, the soil and rock was rich with minerals. The Elder kept his [[dwarven]] slaves toiling away night and day to gather the riches of the earth.
